publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1185.1 Tommy Sheridan: Housing Stock Transferâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-1185) in the name of Ms Margaret Curran, insert at end " and believes that accusations of undue pressure can only be avoided if the Scottish Executive states clearly that management of the capital debt by the Executive is not a condition of transfer and that a "no" vote will not result in the housing needs of tenants in Glasgow and other local authorities not being met because they wish to retain council housing."
